scripts.patch-latest-sdk: (cd sdk && NODE_ENV=development pnpm build) && (for starter in starters/*; do (cd $starter && pnpm clean:vite || true) && (rm -r $starter/node_modules/@redwoodjs/sdk/dist || true) && cp -r sdk/{package.json,dist} $starter/node_modules/@redwoodjs/sdk/; done)
scripts.check-starters:dev: for starter in starters/*; do ./scripts/check-app.sh dev $starter; done
scripts.check-starters:preview: for starter in starters/*; do ./scripts/check-app.sh preview $starter; done
